mapper.insert: INSERT INTO transfer_board ( transfer_board_sq , hope_price , transfer_stat , transfer_board_content , transfer_board_reg_date , ticket_sq , sell_user_sq ) VALUES ( seq_transfer_board_sq.NEXTVAL , #{hopePrice} , 'Y', #{transferBoardContent} , SYSDATE , #{ticketSq} , #{sellUserSq} )
mapper.update: UPDATE transfer_board SET transfer_stat = 'N', transfer_date = SYSDATE, buy_user_sq = #{buyUserSq} WHERE transfer_board_sq = #{transferBoardSq}
mapper.select:
SELECT transferboardsq, hopeprice, transferstat, transferboardcontent, transferboardregdate, ticketseat, ticketsq, sellusersq, showsq, subimage, showname FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rn, transferboardsq, hopeprice, transferstat, transferboardcontent, transferboardregdate, ticketseat, ticketsq, sellusersq, showsq, subimage, showname FROM ( SELECT a.transfer_board_sq AS transferboardsq, a.hope_price AS hopeprice, a.transfer_stat AS transferstat, a.transfer_board_content AS transferboardcontent, TO_CHAR(a.transfer_board_reg_date, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS transferboardregdate, b.ticket_seat AS ticketseat, a.ticket_sq AS ticketsq, a.sell_user_sq AS sellusersq, e.show_sq AS showsq, e.sub_image AS subimage, e.show_name AS showname FROM transfer_board a LEFT JOIN ticket b ON a.ticket_sq = b.ticket_sq LEFT JOIN showing d ON b.showing_sq = d.showing_sq LEFT JOIN show e ON d.show_sq = e.show_sq WHERE a.transfer_stat = 'Y'
AND CONCAT(e.cast,e.show_name) like '%'||#{keyword2}||'%'
ORDER BY
transfer_board_sq DESC
a.hope_price
d.showing_date
) ) WHERE rn > (#{pageNum}-1) * #{amount} AND rn <= #{pageNum} * #{amount}

SELECT a.transfer_board_sq AS transferboardsq, a.hope_price AS hopeprice, a.transfer_stat AS transferstat, a.transfer_board_content AS transferboardcontent, TO_CHAR(a.transfer_board_reg_date, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS transferboardregdate, b.ticket_seat AS ticketseat, a.ticket_sq AS ticketsq, a.sell_user_sq AS sellusersq, c.show_sq AS showsq, d.user_id AS userid, TO_CHAR(c.start_time, 'YYYY.MM.DD" "HH24"시 "MI"분') AS starttime FROM transfer_board a LEFT JOIN ticket b ON a.ticket_sq = b.ticket_sq LEFT JOIN showing c ON b.showing_sq = c.showing_sq LEFT JOIN users d ON d.user_sq = a.sell_user_sq WHERE a.transfer_board_sq = #{transferBoardSq}

SELECT show_sq AS showsq, main_image AS mainimage, sub_image AS subimage, TO_CHAR(start_date, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS startdate, TO_CHAR(end_date, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS enddate, TO_CHAR(reservation_date, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS reservationdate, show_name AS showname, cast, director, show_time AS showtime, viewing_age AS viewingage, show_content AS showcontent, category, show_stat AS showstat, concert_hall_sq AS concerthallsq FROM show WHERE show_sq = ( SELECT c.show_sq AS showsq FROM transfer_board z INNER JOIN ticket a ON z.ticket_sq = a.ticket_sq INNER JOIN ticketing b ON a.ticketing_sq = b.ticketing_sq INNER JOIN showing c ON a.showing_sq = c.showing_sq WHERE z.transfer_board_sq = #{transferBoardSq} )

SELECT seat_class_sq AS SEATCLASSSQ, seat_class AS SEATCLASS, seat_price AS SEATPRICE, show_sq AS SHOWSQ FROM seat_class WHERE show_sq = ( SELECT c.show_sq AS showsq FROM transfer_board z INNER JOIN ticket a ON z.ticket_sq = a.ticket_sq INNER JOIN ticketing b ON a.ticketing_sq = b.ticketing_sq INNER JOIN showing c ON a.showing_sq = c.showing_sq WHERE z.transfer_board_sq = #{transferBoardSq} ) ORDER BY seat_price DESC

SELECT COUNT(transfer_board_sq) FROM transfer_board a LEFT JOIN ticket b ON a.ticket_sq = b.ticket_sq LEFT JOIN showing d ON b.showing_sq = d.showing_sq LEFT JOIN show e ON d.show_sq = e.show_sq WHERE transfer_stat = 'Y'
AND CONCAT(e.cast,e.show_name) like '%'||#{keyword2}||'%'

SELECT transferboardsq, transferboardregdate, showsq, subimage, showname FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rn, transferboardsq, transferboardregdate, showsq, subimage, showname FROM ( SELECT a.transfer_board_sq AS transferboardsq, TO_CHAR(a.transfer_board_reg_date, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS transferboardregdate, e.show_sq AS showsq, e.sub_image AS subimage, e.show_name AS showname FROM transfer_board a LEFT JOIN ticket b ON a.ticket_sq = b.ticket_sq LEFT JOIN showing d ON b.showing_sq = d.showing_sq LEFT JOIN show e ON d.show_sq = e.show_sq WHERE a.transfer_stat = 'Y' ORDER BY d.showing_date ) ) WHERE rn > 0 AND rn <= 5
